getThreshold

public double getThreshold()
Description copied from interface: DemographicFunction
A threshold for underflow on calculation of likelihood of internode intervals. Most demo functions could probably return 0.0 but (e.g.,) the Extended Skyline needs a non zero value to prevent a numerical problem.

Specified by:
getThreshold in interface DemographicFunction
Returns:
